articles.title: Horner: Perez's concerns over Verstappen Saudi GP pace "normal" - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Christian Horner says it was “normal” for Sergio Perez to express concerns about Max Verstappen’s pace during the closing stages of the Formula 1 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.content:
